data.meta_description: Mi Fu [Chinese Calligrapher, 1051-1107] Guide to pictures of works by Mi Fu in art museum sites and image archives worldwide.
data.text:
Mi Fu Works Online

Categorized & Annotated

Museums and Public Art Galleries Worldwide:

Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York City NEW!

Metropolitan Museum of Art Timetable of Art History

Poem Written in a Boat on the Wu River, several images

Princeton University Art Museum, New Jersey

Three Letters, ca.1093-94

Indianapolis Museum of Art, Indiana

Philadelphia Museum of Art NEW!

Art Market:

(e.g. records of past sales at auction; sites providing examples of the artist's signature)

Sotheby's Sold Lot Archive

(database goes as far back as 1998; images where permitted by copyright go about as far back as 2001)

Pictures from Image Archives:

Wikimedia Commons Image Database

Additional Image Search Tools:

(SafeSearch set to "strict"; go to Advanced Search (Flickr/Google) or Preferences (Bing) to change)

Flickr: "Mi Fu" Google Images: "Mi Fu" Bing Images: "Mi Fu"

Articles and Reference Sites:

Encyclopedia Britannica complete article on Mi Fu

Note: The full version of the article is available only if you follow this link. If you bookmark the article and return later, or if you navigate directly to the Britannica website, you will see a 100-word preview only. Troubleshooting

Union List of Artist Names (Getty Museum)

Reference sheet with basic information about the artist and pointers to other references.

Wikipedia, the "Open Content" Encyclopedia

"Look Inside" and "Search Inside" Books at Amazon

Look Inside Books:Selections from the books listed below are scanned in, in high res. Text is clearly readable and art reproductions vary from so-so to excellent. Don't miss the fact that you can usually zoom in via the "View" drop-down menu, along the top row of Amazon's Online Reader. Search Inside Books:Same as "Look Inside", except that the entire book is scanned in, and the text is fully searchable. This is an unbelievable resource, for research and especially for previewing a book when making the decision to buy.

Note: Some "Search Inside" features are limited to people signed in to an account which has previously made a purchase at Amazon.

look inside

Mi Fu: Style and the Art of Calligraphy in Northern Song China
